title: Sensorion secures €60 M financing with €20 M Sanofi stake to advance genetic medicine
summary: Sensorion SA, a clinical-stage biotechnology company developing innovative therapies for hearing loss disorders, announced a €60 million financing round that includes a €20 million strategic investment from Sanofi, the company said. The reserved offering also attracted support from existing shareholders including Redmile Group, Artal (advised by Invus) and Sofinnova Partners, as well as new investors […] The post Sensorion secures €60 M financing with €20 M Sanofi stake to advance genetic medicine appeared first on Longevity.Technology.
